duties_responsibilities.duty: Take primary responsibility for all aspects of the client relationship and work with the Operations Team to deliver a best-in-class experience.
Utilize a client-centered wealth management philosophy to deliver results for clients.
Meet with clients to strategize and update their financial plan, including tax planning and portfolio allocation, and build deeper connections with clients.
Resolve issues effectively, call out problems, and solve them in a practical and healthy manner.
Follow and adhere to the company’s core processes and operating system with consistency.
Demonstrate alignment with the company’s core values: Loyalty, Resourcefulness, Resolve, and Empathy.
Collaborate with the leadership team to fulfill objectives.
Provide high-level communication when working with clients.
Provide clients with a WOW experience and meet with them annually for reviews.
Acquire additional assets from current clients and referrals.
Ensure the CEO has weekly updated reports on progress for each quarter.
Attend or participate in on-going self-improvement and growth.

education_certification.credential: 5+ years experience in the financial industry, preferably with a focus on financial planning and wealth management
Life and Health Insurance Agent Experience
